title: Breaking graphite through a ball-milling process: the thermal conductivity and mechanical properties of polyethylene composites
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,27948-27956
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03653K, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Yuan Liu, Jimin Zhang, Xianhong Wang, Yingchun Liu, Xiuli Hu, Chaochao Cao, Xiongwei Qu, Beckry Abdel-Magid
Octadecylamine (ODA)-grafted EGP (ODA@EGP) and subsequent polyethylene/ODA@EGP composites with high thermal conductivity and robust mechanical properties are successfully prepared via ball-milling and melt-mixing methods, respectively.
